list.title: Common.DeleteConfirmationDialog
list.description: Dialog for confirming deletion actions.

list.title: Contexts.ThemeProvider
list.description: Provider component for theme context.

list.title: Dashboard
list.description: Components for displaying and interacting with recipes in the dashboard view

list.title: Dashboard.DashboardContainer
list.description: Container component for the recipes dashboard.

list.title: Dashboard.PaginationControls
list.description: Controls for paginating through recipe results.

list.title: Dashboard.RecipeCard
list.description: Displays a recipe as a card with title, notes, and action buttons.

list.title: Dashboard.RecipeGrid
list.description: Displays a grid of recipe cards with optional loading state.

list.title: Dashboard.SearchBar
list.description: Search bar component for filtering recipes.

list.title: Layout
list.description: Components for the application layout structure

list.title: Layout.Footer
list.description: Footer component with application information and links.

list.title: Layout.NavigationBar
list.description: Main navigation bar for the application.

list.title: Layout.PageContainer
list.description: Container component for page layout with navigation and footer.

list.title: Layout.ThemeToggle
list.description: Toggle button for switching between light and dark themes.

list.title: Pages
list.description: Page-level components that represent entire screens in the application

list.title: Recipe
list.description: Components for viewing, creating, and editing individual recipes

list.title: Recipe.RecipeActionBar
list.description: Action bar for recipe pages with back, edit, and delete buttons.

list.title: Recipe.RecipeDetails
list.description: Displays detailed information about a recipe.

list.title: Recipe.RecipeForm
list.description: Form for creating or editing recipes.

list.title: createBlankRecipe
list.description: Creates a blank recipe template for new recipe creation

list.title: createRecipe
list.description: Creates a new Recipe object with the given properties

list.title: fetchRecipes
list.description: Fetches recipes from the API and converts them to front-end model format

list.title: parseIngredients
list.description: Helper function to parse ingredients from API format to front-end format

list.title: validateRecipe
list.description: Validates a recipe object
